original_text: And after crying out and convulsing him terribly, it came out, and the boy was like a corpse, so that most of them said, “He is dead.”
korean_text: 귀신이 소리 지르며 아이로 심히 경련을 일으키게 하고 나가니 그 아이가 죽은 것 같이 되어 많은 사람이 말하기를 죽었다 하나

sentences.original_text: And after crying out and convulsing him terribly
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 큰 소리를 지르며 그를 심하게 경련시킨 후에

sentences.original_text: and the boy was like a corpse
so that most of them said
